SELECT bm.* FROM base_module bm LEFT JOIN base_role_module brm ON bm.ID = brm.BASE_ROLE_ID WHERE bm.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE} AND bm.MODULE_TYPE = #{MODULE_TYPE} AND bm.STATE = 0 AND bm.ID IN ( SELECT BASE_MODULE_ID FROM base_role_module WHERE base_role_module.PROJECT_CODE = #{PROJECT_CODE} AND base_role_module.BASE_ROLE_ID = #{BASE_ROLE_ID} )
